content: Absolutely, love it! 👉( k 6 8 k e 2 f )🔥Cool level game. Am in level 180. But one annoying thing about this game is that the rest team has got much better weapons then the left team. I've been getting no feedback whatsoever regarding my game that freezes 78 out of 88 games to play. I lost a lot of points because of this issued , and there is absolutely nothing wrong with my internet connection. The game completely freezing. Please fix this, this has been going on the new version on 51st anniversary.

The app performance is very slow when you are opening it and wanting to do a payment action immediately. The reason I noticed is that, when the app is opening its trying to load my contacts too at the same time. This is absolutely not required for someone especially when they're using this at shops and pay using QR code scanning. Need to separate the user experience for shopping users and people who want to transfer money to another user.

From few days I'm facing some issues, recently I have upgraded my sim from 3G to 4G but the number didn't change. After changing the sim gpay is not working. It is saying check whether my number is registered with my bank account and yes it is connected and I used to use without any problem before changing the sim. Now it is not possible for me to register, I've tried by putting my phone on airplane mode and even removed my sim and inserted but nothing is working. Plz tell me what to do. Thanks.

Worst money transfer app. Google does not know the importance of financial transaction. Thank god that my first transaction which is stucked is only of Rs.100. After raising dispute multiple time, I got a call from Google Pay for asking bank statement of the month of both parties depositor and recipient. Really??? Is this a solution??? However, I provided Google Pay account screenshot of both parties, in which it can clearly see that money is deducted and didn't transfer to recipient account.

Wrost app....unable to pay electricity bill Update.... I alredy cleared its cache , butno help. Reach out to cutomer care help but they did not resolve it. Its a bug in google pay , i also lost one offer scratch card due to this bug. Will you give it back to me , or do u doing somthing to fix it. No.... Thats why i am going to uninstall it

Nice app for upi payment, but right now i am facing an issue regarding account restoring in new phone. I have changed my phone and trying to restore account. It's getting fail. I tried in iOS as well android. Facing problem in both. Although i used PhonePe app in my phone and it got restore easily so please resolve the issue.

Google pay has become very unreliable use to love it but now all they do is deduct the money u r trying to transfer causing alot of problem for the receiver n the sender. Wen it's urgent don't use Google pay m on the verge of uninstalling it why do they have to deduct the money. If it can't be transfer then don't deduct the money from our account u have no right to deduct the money n hold our money for 3-5 days which does not belong to u,this is a harrassment. It's causing alot of problem. STOP

Hi Google LLC team, from past 1 month I am facing problem while trying to make payments through your app. It's was taking very long time to open payment section, mobile is hanging & major times app was not responding. Even after updating to version I was facing same problem. Please look into this.

Worst payment app I had ever used ... whenever I try to recharge.. payment always fails... Please try to improve your services.. most of the time money gets deducted from my account but payment isn't done . If it continuously goes on to be like this, am not going to suggest anyone and I myself will uninstall it..

Google Pay is not compatible with Android Q. When I enter my UPI ID anywhere, a notification will come and tapping on that should open the app. But in Q, tapping on the notification doesn't open the app. Need to manually open the app, go to All transactions and click the pending transaction to make payment. It's ironic since Google's app is even not compatible with Android Q.

This issue has still not be resolved! Takes more time and steps to complete a payment as compared to other apps like Paytm and PhonePe. Please work on the UI and UX of this app. It takes forever to load if you have a lot of payment history as it has to fetch all of the previous transactions everytime you open the app.

Hi, still I am having this issue...pls look into this matter...Whenever i will make payment through Google pay it will says your bank is not accepting payments. If i use some other app bank is accepting payment only pblm with Google pay. Due to google pay transaction i am not able to book my railway tatkal ticket on time. I am using updated version of gpay app.

I have been using this app since a long time now but now it only sucks. Everytime I click on new payment it crashes and its happening since months now. I have updated the app, reinstalled and did everything which is possible but can't seem to work. Hope I get a help on this issue else I have already started using your competitors now.

Don't use Google pay app because having lots of bugs if your bank account is linked with bank and phone number but the app can not able to identify proper linking with a bank and mobile number they always say please your mobile number with your bank when you update the Google am using from one year Google pay account but but after updating the Google pay after typing my mobile numberyour mobile number is not linked with your bank and other upi apps are performing then Google

This was a good app for payment but recently when i have a offer of bill payment . So when i tried to oay the bill .it did not work. I tried almost 20 to 30 times but next day when the time period of the offer end i tried to pay the bill it smoothly works . Wow . So nice. I want my cashback ,my reward otherwise i will end my account and my family's account on Google pay too.

Still best than other.bug free, smooth interface,and seamless. Only thing is the "Check balance" option should be on the top somewhere as it's difficult to find new/some users and should be simply icon based. Would be convenient to all.

Google Pay मे रेफरल कोड 👉(m 1 v l 6 x)👈 डालिये और 101rs free मे पाइये. Absolutely! I love it! A really genuine payment transfer app.. love that you can connect with a few friends and have a great time in the game... the only issue we face is that our voice cannot be heard sometimes.. people refer to it as 'voice glitch' where your team is connected but no one can hear each other... Restarting the app fixes that, but still... Anyways.. good game..

Suddenly I'm not able to do any transaction. Getting the error like, registerd mobile number is different from the bank a/c number. Even though that is the correct phone number. Tried to remove and adding the bank a/c number but not working .unable to do any transaction. I'm worried about this problem .please do something .

I am really unhappy with this service now. Everytime i try to see my account balance it shows bank server is not available. Sometime even the account gets deactivated and when i try to restore it shows faulty result. My cellphone and sim are working perfectly. I was using this app in many ways to pay money for online shopping and other transactions also. I am really pissed off now. Fix this problem. Thanks

This app has sooo many problems, you can't deal with it. I guess it would be really easy for the professional hacker to hack our account and take our money . Now I don't feel secured with all my money in GP. Fix the bugs

Hello sir ,my experience is good with this app But i have one problem i have used my both phone number for same account Now i had issue that i am unable to delete my one phone no. Which is not linked with my account. Please help . I have both no. On same phone I want to delete my phone no. Actually who want to pay some money in my account ,they are able to see my both phonepay account . Please solve the matter as fast as possible. I hope that i am able to explain my problem.

App is good, but the thing is that even if you have the contact in your phone, yuo will not be able to get the person without providing the exact name they have provided in GP; Making difficult to send the money to the nearest buddies. If there is an Accounting software within gp to record transaction (along with off GP transaction), it will be greatful..also please update the interface as it shows every person's name whom you fid transaction rather than making any fav list

In every transaction, there is a scratch card "better luck next". It's too annoying. Could you please stop such things or give proper rewards. Why you always try to fool us. And when I want an urgent transaction it will shows server down.. Worst app

worked fine from start but how i don't know the bank account got delinked automatically and now i have been trying to link it back but not able to do it from past 3days. It's so annoying. Sent feedback but no response.also before you respond with installing the latest version let me assure you i have done everything that could be done. Help me out if you can or else this is it. I don't want to spend more time on this.

This app is good I could have give 5 star but recently on 15jun 2020 I made a transaction to send money from my account but till now the date 20jun 2020 is reached but the money does not deposited to the recipient account . plz solve the problem as soon as possible .

Hi, the app is really good, but rcently when i am not able to select a new payment, the app restarts and starts all over again. This has not reolved yet after many bug fixes, hope this gets resolved soon.

Worst app, i have tried million times paying through the app, there are always errors, and no proper explanation. Bank server down, bank account already added, if its added then why doesnt it show in primary accounts while making payments? Or is it because i have joint account? App should give proper reason and solutions to the problems.

If I transferred Rs. 1500 something, the coupon came, but when I opened the coupon. I showed the money 127 . but the caseback is still in processing. It is a nonsense application. I have now uninstalled the application. If there is a caseback, I have to install it, otherwise phone pay is a better application than yours .. Please send me my reward.

Nice app but still something more facility must add like 1,DTH-GTPL,2,Broadband GTPL,3,Insurance all insurance off oriental insurance company, all India insurance company all vehicles insurance premium payment facility is basic needs 4,all type of of loan EMI of all bank nationalised and private bank all Loan Housing,vehicle business 5, traffic fine chalan memo of all citys 6,municipal and village panchayat tax of All municipal and village 7,all govt tax GST,income tax, stampsduty please add

It's a really good app. But i find it doing partiality with me. All the people who uses it in my contact list, recieves gift vowchers. They get a lot of money. but in my case i rarely get. Although i use it a lot. my highest gift is ₹18. Although I have 6 cupons. After one year of use. Why google. This is partiality. I love ur company. Don't do this partiality. No i am not mad. 😅😅

Everytime I try making a new payment, the app gets stuck. I have tried updating the app, sending feedback, everything! So I can only repeat payments but never start a new payment or pay bills or anything. Very frustrating. And please dont ask me to clear cache. I've tried it. As far as contacting the help section goes, you guys are busy

For a few months now, I've been unable to even load previous payments or send money to anyone. The page just loads and never goes into it. I updated it and the problem still remains. I've tried using WiFi and data. Google pay has never gone 6 months without any issues. I'm thinking of changing platforms.

Everytime I make a transaction, on Google pay either I send money or receive money, I get scratch card which I have always got as "Better luck Next Time".. I totally agree, once or twice it's ok and understandable, but everytime I deposit money there is this same message that pops up everytime, and it's really annoying.

Worst experience with this app as it's been more then two months still my transaction is in process and raised the dispute as well but no response from Google team. Worst service, banks are saying ask your Google pay provider don't ask us. Great blame game goes on but no one cares about customers money.

Everytime I make a transaction on google pay either send money, or bill payment, I get scratch card, after opening which gives only "better luck next time". But when the person I've sent money return me back, he got cashback. For 1-2 times it is okay. But getting it everytime is really annoying. At the very first days, this was a great application. But day by day it becomes worse than before.

Google Pay मे रेफरल कोड 👉(i 3 1 6 Z)👈 डालिये और 81rs free मे पाइये. Absolutely! I love it! A really genuine payment transfer app.. love that you can connect with a few friends and have a great time in the game... the only issue we face is that our voice cannot be heard sometimes.. people refer to it as 'voice glitch' where your team is connected but no one can hear each other... Restarting the app fixes that, but still... Anyways.. good game..

Good integration with BHIM/UPI. Interface could improve (compare with PayTm). After payment, the App should show the payment confirmation message. now it is inconvenient that we should go to all transactions to show to the vendor. .. Feb-2020: As of recent update the GooglePay app has stopped working on Xiaomi Mi note 4 (4GB, 64GB) :-(

Failed transaction is common, I guess. You'd hope "it's GOOGLE", what could possibly go wrong. But NO!!! Transfer of fund comes through only after the 1000th time of trying. You could almost never check the account balance with a follow-up reason stating poor network or something like that, when clearly my network is in full healthy swing. Don't bother telling me to restart, reinsert sim card, check storage or whatever you've been telling. None has worked. Planning to switch to other apps.

Whenever i start to make a payment, the app allows me to enter the required amount to be send thereafter if i click on proceed to pay, it won't unclose the unified payment interface to enter the pin perhaps the app will get instant force close and again reopens to enter the login pin. Later after many attempts the app will work as usually. I don't even think there is a fault in my phone because all the other UPI payment apps do works normally. This is the only issue that makes me to rate 1🌟!

Google pay initially used to be very good for payments, transactions. But nowadays they has ruined the app. Google pay has a very good interface and that's all it has. The payments gets cancelled a ton of times. You can hardly check your bank balance on Google pay, it always says "Bank servers not respond". Whereas, they did respond in its competitors. Also, their mini apps aren't working very well. I tried RedBus on Google pay and PhonePe. Phonepe has shown very accurate results than Gpay.

Hii. I'm using this app since long time and I'm quite happy with it. But I'm facing issue since last few days that it's not working. When I try to open the app it gets hanged. I've to uninstall it and install it again later. Sometimes I don't get otp for logging in. Please help.

I won't able to access my account due to sim change and otp not receiving on mobile to re register..I had contact to bank and service network my sms service are active .even other transaction otp received...But google pay otp not receiving from last three to four days hence google pay account stop

I've checked my date & time and also contacted with my network provider all of this are correct, even I've visited ur Google support team; but there is nothing to solve my problem. The otp hasn't been coming. Hence as possible I request to you please solve my problem.

I am trying since March to update my bank details. And yes, I have clicked on help centers, watched the video multiple times, cleaned caches, switched off/on, put in flight mode, Inserted/reinserted SIM card. But you know what! Nothing worked. The irony is I am adding the same bank account I was using for gpay before.... Just a step away in giving up altogether.

This was my 1st app to do all banking transactions and initial days it was WOW, After upgrading the App performance is too worst. 1st thing is that Hanging issue, payment issues like most of the time payments will be declined and when I'm trying to pay using QR scan I should wait for min 15 to 20 secs to get it open and other issues too. Please try to fix the bugs at the earliest.

The day it was launched, I been a user, and it serves its purpose to the best. The design language has been minimalist right from the day 1. Ease of use allowed it to grow in most rural of India. We are glad that such a service was exceptionally well received (by Govt and public) in India and paved the way for other countries to adopt. Kudos.

Very bad experience. My saving bank account with sufficient balance is shown as overdraft account. Hence can't proceed and can't pay a single rupee. Google pay cus care are saying talk with your bank. Bank personnel said that issue is related to Google Pay and not with bank. Everything is ok with bank. Don't understand what's the problem?

Using this app for last two years. Network issues and failed transaction in common feature of this app. From last almost 4 days this app has failed to work . restarted , reinstalled again , but of no use. Not able to get OTP after reinstalling it again, though network is showing full in mobile. Had also send feedback on email but no response from help center team.

This is just so annoying. My Google pay account was active until few days before. It was logged out automatically without any intimation to me. And now it doesn't even let me login. I am trying from last 3-4 days but I did not even receive an otp to login. Tried contacting customer service, they gave me few cosmetic solutions which did not work. And their last statement was that we cannot help you!

I wanted to report an issue which I am observing with Google pay payment option on merchant site. When you are on a merchant site and for payment select Google pay option and click on submit, it direct to ccavenue site with a message to open the Google pay app and do the payment.I opened the Google pay and payment was completed successfully, and on returning back to merchant site, the payment was not reflected even after 5-10 mins. Later error message came. This happens every time.

Irritable.... Please developer on Google pay to fix the technical problem of this app. Even after inserting the correct UPI PIN, it is blocked for 24 hours by speaking incorrectly upi pin entered many times. Problem is not correct even after 24 hours , Neither the UPI pin is changed nor forged and is again blocked for 24 hours. I have been having this problem since Sunday and have not yet recovered.

Worst App, the money is diducted from my account and it was nither diposited in receivers acc or mine account, i have raised multiple complaint and share the bank statement also but no response from them, also they said share the bank statement on email i have shared that then they said to upload that in their link but i was not able to do that...i already told them i am getting error to upload that, i can forward it, i did all things but no response from them

Always money stuck while transaction. Google pay team should remove the reward option, always the word pop-up "Better luck next time". It seems they are doing prank with user. Atleast don't give fake hope. If i vote out how much is the percentage of rewards claim? Definitely will get revert would be "0%". Just looting the people...

It's a good app.. it's is hassle free, but every 2 months why i am logged out of this app ??...amd everytime i have to face issues regarding verifying my mobile no. again and re-registering myself. This needs to be seriously taken because in amazon pay or other counter mobile payment apps no such issue prevails. You people need to fix this sooner else it will force me to uninstall this app and to never use it again EVER !!

Worst app. we un install and reinstall it then it Never recognizes bank account unless we try for atleast 20 times. Again pin generation is a problem. dont know whom to contact to problem redressal as they do not have any customer care or anything. The faqs are untterly useless.

It became worst , really I mean it. It doesn't work all time. Whenever we pay, first thing the money gets deducted from account and it's showing as " Processing , up to few days". Guys learn something from Phone pe. Won't buse it ever and will tell the same to my friends and relatives. Just imagine a situation where you pay a local shop keeper via Google pay and though the money got deducted, still shows processing, then what should we do? Giving one star as there was nothing like 0 or -1 etc.

The app has lost its charm.No scratch card,no cashback offered since a long time.Going to uninstall this app.Payment via other payment portals is far better these days.Most of the time if any scratch card pops up,it shows BETTER LUCK NEXT TIME.

Hi The app is best but from last 5 days I am unable to send money or check my account balance. However I receive money from second party. I confirmed with my bank and as per their recommendation I reinstalled the app still it didn't help Lastly I have deactivated my account Need you assistance

WORST app...when i payed money to another google pay user.My money has been debited from my account but no credited to google pay user account.Many time this issue was facing"WHERE IS MY MONEY"??.I'm really disapointed. going for uninstall this app and rated 1 out of 5 star..😡😡😡when my money is refund i will give u 5 star

The app was working really fine. But 2 weeks back i faced a problem & my bank account was de activated. From past 2 weeks i am in contact with their specialist team but no one solve the problem. Really disgusting that it is taking so long. The only thing specialist say 'sorry for the inconvienvce' but will not solve the problem. During these difficult times when digital payment is at peak, facing lots of problem but google pay specialist doing nothing.

I use this only for small transaction or for casual use. This app has failed/stopped working at the most important payments and took days to resolve. I rather use Phonepe now. Though it is not perfect , but works most of the times flawlessly and can save you when google pay fails. This app should be used only when no option left and that too for casual and small payment. Thank you

After my phone update it asked for verification of mobile number and bank account and I tried...... Mobile number got verified and bank account too but at the time of creating pin it shows retry later...... My Amazon pay doesn't sho these types of problem..... It also asked for verification and after that it works flawlessly......I have re installed Google Pay and still it's not working.

Everything is good but often the link between my bank account and the app automatically gets deactivated and sending and receiving payments stops. That is not the problem but the problem is that when I press activate bank account then sms charge is deducted every time but the activation is failed every time. It costs me so much for activation each time. I have tried today activating atleast 20 times but it still fails and not activating. All my important payments are stuck due to this problem.

My account temporary disabled.i tried to activate but only mobile number is verified. "Something wrong in your bank server we tried to fix it" This error happened.so i disappointed. After i use paytm upi its working very good. Goodbye to google pay. But i miss you service any reward for transactions.

It's staggering how a Google app doesn't follow notification good practices. Ads and promotional notifications are all lumped in the same category as payment related notifications. Please put them in different categories. I don't want to be bombarded with ad notifications, which I can't silence because it could be a payment related information.

Can you allow to add credit cards and make payment via credit cards to other merchants and travel partners, other apps already have this feature, but in GPay is option is not available. Can you add this feature and release the new patch or version for download. Different modes of payments where user can select his mode of payment credit card, debit card, currently paying from credit card option is not available in Gpay. Can you update this feature and make it easier for customers to download1

I really like this app and use it for most of my bill payments and money transfer. The only problem I face is the lag. If there is a notification, it takes a long time to open after tapping. Please fix it. Edit: Issue with the lag is resolved.

Google,why are you guys fooling us in the name of “scratch cards” Talking about my experience, I didn't receive any scratch card in my last 13-14 transactions Every time,it says “better luck next time” It's high time you people stop this type of thing.. definitely not expected from Google!!

There's an issue with this app...that everyone can search our phone number and call us...and many calls are coming from unkown people...that we have to ignore them.. they can know that we have bank account and also have google pay account by searching phone number in google pay...so do something with this...because it's really bad ..i am aware from this...but there are lots of people who lost their money by this fraud call who can take our phone number information by google pay...

Every now and then, the accounts get unlinked all of a sudden and then I have to keep re-linking it 3-4 times. The transactions are not at all smooth anymore and this is actually irritating given the factor of time saving and urgency.

I used this app. There are some bugs in this app. I don't really like it. This app is time wasting. This app does not work properly. Please don't download this app. Don't use this app. Go for some other good apps like paytm, phone pay, etc.

Please read my note very carefully. I'm writing and raising this for the walfare for all. I'm feeling totally insecure on Google Pay. Please secure my Google Pay account by adding more advanced security features. And clarify a burning point, if someone may konw our UPI pin and bank details so is our whole financial system safe and sound in this case? And the app requires location services that I don't think is necessary so please clarify all these points very quickly. Thanks! Your Naresh.

do not belive this app , becs when there is urgent the payments are not possible due to some faults in server .once i went to hotel and i had my bf but to pay them google pay is not supportting due to there servere or other issues due to this i sufferd a lot at that time so donot go any where with google pay do not trust it more

These issues should be addressed as soon as possible: 1.Security need to be tightened as many times it doesn't ask for password when leave application open and goes to other applications or screen. 2. Transection failure has become a habit of this application. Many times payment is debited from account and transection gets failed. 3. Most pathetic thing is there is no proper redressal . Proper Compaint raising of payment failure and debited payment should be there to avoid inconvenience.

Goohle pay, 1)Make the app more lite and stable. 2)Give a new feel and look. 3)Bring new features and tools. 4)Make a complete makeover to the app. 5)Bring stability and smoothness in tha app. 6)Bring dark mode 7)Change the homepage and background and bring unique concept as others provide these days.

It was good in the beginning. Now everytime i send money through gpay, the money gets debited from my asking but the person to whom I'm sending the money doesn't receive the it immediately. It takes 3-4 days. This is happening for recharging my data packs too. Please look into it, because i don't want to discontinue using this app.

Such a pathetic experience with latest version. I m existing user and retrying to activate my bank acc in app and as the sms is sent to verify, push notification appears and gpay app says operation failed & don't go away from this screen. I can't control this as it is OS related. I don't understand how can you publish such build with bugs.

So bad experience, friend don't download this app, if any one have emergency for money and your transaction in processing its takes 3 or 4 day to credit receivers account, is that real time money transfer??? And one thig when its processing your money already debited in your accout.. it's horrible that time you do not have any option to wait 3 or 4 day... so bad experiences...

This is really frustrating..all my data on this app is lost..and i am not able to recover it...their chat session also didnt came out to be helpng much..i had to add all the things agan still no past records recovered....and few months back also i had issue with my transactn..amt ws debited but not creditd to the otherprsn..i raised dispute regardng the same and no response was received from their side..and now i dont kno how do i get my old data like transctn histry rewards accnts back..

After phone reset, I can't activate my account anymore. I have tried 100 times to get OTP but to not avail. It always says please try again later. Now it won't allow me to transfer or neither receive money, one issue after another, I don't know what's wrong with this Google pay

I am using this app for one year. It was good in the beginning. But now a days i can't send Money to my friends. Using phone number & Bank account. Then Gpay is automatically get closed for several times while using. Now i can send money only by Scan QR Code method only can you please give me a solution or else i will uninstall this app.

There is no zero rating for this otherwise i give zero. If there is no reward or cash back then what is the use of third party app. We can do money transfer and payment through banking app. No need of this Better Luck Next Time app. Please change the name of the app to "BETTER LUCK NEXT TIME" UNINSTALL THIS FAKE APP.

The earlier version was very good, I did not have any inconvenience on doing the transaction but since I have updated, it is very inconvenient. Apps autometic stops when a new trajection is performed. Worst has been the experience. 0 star

The app is very bad I referred my friend the app and gave him my referral code and he used it to do the first transaction and neither he got any cash rewards not me his is showing processing for more than a day it usually takes less than a minute and my google pay account which should get ₹51 haven't got a penny after this I'll uninstall this app if you don't want to give cash rewards Don't do false claims like share our app.

I am using this from past 2 years, but now a days it's not working properly and everytime I sent money, the amount will debut from account and the status will show as processing processing. Worst app, phonepe is much much better than this 👎👎👎👎.

Since 3-4 days i have been trying to link my bank account. But all the time i get one error saying "couldn't fetch your bank account details". Whereas i have been using that number for all other transactions and is properly linked to my account. Please solve this issue ASAP and provide proper customer care facility to our queries.

Initially , it was too good but now a days it's worst . I could not able to restore my account and now it doesn't give any earning reward . It only give “Better Luck Next Time ". Overall it is now worst UPI App. Plz , don't install.

I could have given 5 start but there are so many issues with this app. 1. There is no option to choose UPI ID as per our choice, this app picks UPI ID automatically. 2. Almost everyday it asks for new update, not sure what kind of bugs they fix everyday, sometimes payment gets failed when we dont update the app. Will change my rating when there would be UPI ID change option. Thanks

This is app is really sucks now don't the know actual reason I have been registering my account details several times but it doesn't not accept liability for any further assistance. So I got really sick of using it .

I use google pay from 2 years. There is no problem with app. But after I update my mobile no. to sbi a/c , I can't add it again in the app. App says create pin and when I provide my debit card details, app can't create pin only says something went wrong. I also try your all suggesions but my problem not solve. What is problem? Pl reply

My google pay was working fine for some time but since 1 year I am not able to do any transactions. Tried everything like deleting and adding bank account again, re-installing the app but to vain. This is getting on my nerves now. Getting the error like "we are having trouble reaching partner servers." please help.

Best app, but one suggestion regarding fraudsters misusing the REQUEST PAYMENT option, please set this option as DISABLED BY DEFAULT, unless and untill specified by the user, for either one time or multiple times. Set the REQUEST PAYMENT option as off, hope u guys are getting my point, wht is happening is fraudsters are requsting money by some or the other reason, and most of the time user has no time to think, and send the payment unknowingly, please work on this issue
After updating the app today I am unable to add bank account, whenever I try to add my internet get disconnect and I receive a message saying "couldn't register" Internet connection required...

It's really a nice app I do all my transaction from this it's useful but some of the time it won't work mostly in starting of the month it's not working properly for me from last 2-3 months to pay my bills. And not getting my bills in notification I have to go and refresh to check my bills. Else good app

Dear GooglePay , Please be improve yourself more. One off my transcation is done amount is debited but receiver not receive a any amount. My account is debited . For those who have facing issue while logging in( Repeated sms confirmation issue) i will provide a solution. Click on confirm button but do not send the pop up message. Minimize the message button and go back to the app(without opening again) . Now it will take few seconds before it asks for manual input of your mobile number.Give the mobile number and confirm.It will work 100 percent. Solutions: 1. SMS sent again & again but not proceeding further: Some permissions are blocked, go to App setting, select mconnectplus and allow all permissions and other permissions also if shown under the App. 2. Invalid Process: After installing the app restart (switch off and on) your phone 3. Showing sim or device change and asking for re verification: Always use the same sim link while using the app, if u have 2 sims or using wifi

Following is Solution. Just visit Bank of Baroda ATM. Deregister the App. Uninstall the App. Register again for Your Number. You will get an SMS for new MPIN after successful Registration. Install the App. Login. Send message. After sending message, Don't come directly to App but by using Back Arrow Key slowly, Put the Number Manualy as App guide and wait for OTP. And then use MPIN recived to start App.

Security Risk to be Assessed : Screenshot is only restricted on Login Page.
